title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
**Unleash Your Productivity with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit!**

Get ready to take your DIY projects and professional tasks to the next level with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2). This powerful and versatile kit includes two essential tools, two 20V Lithium Ion batteries, and a charger, all in a convenient and durable package.

**Compact and Lightweight Design**

The DCD771 Drill/Driver and DCF885 Impact Driver are designed to be compact and lightweight, making them easy to maneuver in tight spaces and reducing fatigue during extended use. The ergonomic handles and single sleeve ratcheting chuck on the drill/driver, and the 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck on the impact driver, ensure a comfortable grip and easy bit changes.

**Unmatched Power and Performance**

The DCD771 Drill/Driver delivers 300 UWO of power and has a 2-speed transmission (0-450/0-1500 RPM) to tackle a wide range of applications. The DCF885 Impact Driver boasts a powerful motor and a 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips.

**Superior Visibility**

Both tools feature LED lights to illuminate your work area. The drill/driver has a LED foot light for superior visibility, while the impact driver has a 3-LED light ring with a 20-second delay to reduce shadows and improve visibility.

**Convenience and Value**

This combo kit includes two 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger, so you can keep working without interruptions. The kit's compact design and durable construction make it easy to transport and store.

**What's Included:**

* 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
* 1x Charger

**Upgrade Your Toolbox Today!**

Order the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2) now and experience the power, convenience, and reliability that DEWALT is known for. Perfect for DIY enthusiasts, contractors, and professionals alike, this kit is sure to become your go-to solution for a wide range of applications.

**Unleash Your Productivity with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit**

Take your DIY projects and professional tasks to the next level with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. This powerful and versatile kit includes two essential tools: a 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (DCD771) and a 1/4-inch Impact Driver (DCF885), both designed to deliver exceptional performance and convenience.

**Compact and Lightweight Design**

Both tools feature a compact and lightweight design, making them perfect for working in tight spaces and reducing fatigue. The ergonomic handle and single sleeve ratcheting chuck on the Drill/Driver provide comfortable grip and control, while the 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck on the Impact Driver allows for quick and easy bit changes.

**Unmatched Power and Performance**

The Drill/Driver boasts 300 UWO of power output, with a 2-speed transmission (0-450/0-1500 RPM) to tackle a wide range of applications. The Impact Driver delivers superior torque and speed, with a 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips.

**Superior Visibility and Convenience**

Enjoy superior visibility in dark or confined spaces with the LED foot light and 3-LED light ring on the Impact Driver, which features a 20-second delay to reduce shadows. The kit also includes two 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger, providing extended runtime and convenient recharging.

**Everything You Need in One Kit**

This comprehensive kit includes:

* 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
* 1x Charger

Get ready to tackle any project with confidence and ease. Order the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power and versatility of DEWALT's 20V MAX technology!

**Unleash Your Productivity with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit**

Take your projects to the next level with the ultimate power tool combo kit from DEWALT. This comprehensive kit includes a 20V MAX Cordless Drill/Driver (DCD771) and a 1/4-inch Impact Driver (DCF885), both designed to deliver exceptional performance, comfort, and control.

**Compact and Lightweight Design**

Both tools feature a compact and lightweight design, making them easy to maneuver in tight spaces and reducing fatigue during extended use. The ergonomic handle of the drill/driver provides comfort and control, while the impact driver's 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips for added convenience.

**Powerful Performance**

The drill/driver boasts a powerful 300 UWO motor with a 2-speed transmission (0-450/0-1500 RPM) for tackling a wide range of applications. The impact driver delivers swift fastening with its 3 LED light ring, providing superior visibility without shadows.

**Convenience and Versatility**

This combo kit includes 2 x 20V Lithium-Ion batteries, ensuring you have the power you need to complete your projects. The charger is also included, making it easy to keep your batteries charged and ready to go. With the DEWALT 20V MAX system, you can use the same batteries across multiple tools, making it a valuable addition to your toolkit.

**What's in the Box:**

* 1 x DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1 x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2 x 20V Lithium-Ion Batteries
* 1 x Charger

**Upgrade Your Toolkit Today!**

Get ready to tackle any project with confidence and efficiency. Order the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2) now and experience the power and versatility of DEWALT's 20V MAX system.
